results.title: [Gene expression profile analysis of T lymphocytes involved in pathogenesis of severe aplastic anemia by using bioinformatics method as a novel way of drug screening].
results.journal: Zhongguo Shi Yan Xue Ye Xue Za Zhi
results.text_hl: Similarity analysis of gene expression profiles of @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Aplastic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000741 @@@SAA@@@ and drugs showed that @CHEMICAL_hydroxycamptothecinum @CHEMICAL_MESH:C527042 @@@hydroxycamptothecin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might have a potential therapeutic efficacy on @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Aplastic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000741 @@@SAA@@@.

[Gene expression profile analysis of T lymphocytes involved in pathogenesis of severe aplastic anemia by using bioinformatics method as a novel way of drug screening].
